item.name: Agent Software Version
item.description: The UPS agent software version. This variable may or may not have the same value as upsIdentUPSSoftwareVersion in some implementations.

item.name: Low Transfer Voltage
item.description: The number of input voltages. Phase to phase or phase to neutral. This variable indicates the number of rows in the input table.

item.name: Input - Voltage
item.description: The number of input voltages. Phase to phase or phase to neutral. This variable indicates the number of rows in the input table.

item.name: Maximum Input Voltage
item.description: The number of input voltages. Phase to phase or phase to neutral. This variable indicates the number of rows in the input table.

item.name: Input - Source Availability
item.description: Reports power input sources for PDU.

item.name: Minimum Input Voltage
item.description: The number of input voltages. Phase to phase or phase to neutral. This variable indicates the number of rows in the input table.

item.name: PDU Software Version
item.description: The UPS firmware/software version(s). This variable may or may not have the same value as upsIdentAgentSoftwareVersion in some implementations.

item.name: Manufacturer Identification
item.description: The name of the UPS manufacturer.

item.name: Device Name
item.description: A string identifying the UPS. This object should be set by the administrator.

item_prototype.name: Outlet - Ramp data type of outlet $1
item_prototype.description: The type of data associated with ramp action.

item_prototype.name: Outlet - Ndx group of outlet $1
item_prototype.description: tlPDUOutletGroupIndex of corresponding outlet group, or 0 if ungrouped.

item_prototype.name: Outlet - Name of outlet $1
item_prototype.description: A string identifying the devices attached to the output(s) of the device.

item_prototype.name: Outlet - Ramp action of outlet $1
item_prototype.description: The ramp action to take on the Outlet.

item_prototype.name: Outlet - Shed action of outlet $1
item_prototype.description: The shed action to take on the Outlet.

item_prototype.name: Outlet - Shed action data type of outlet $1
item_prototype.description: The type of data associated with shed action.

item_prototype.name: Outlet - State of outlet $1
item_prototype.description: The current state of the Outlet.

trigger.name: PDU Lost Input Redundancy
trigger.description: PDU has lost power redundancy. An input has failed.
